statements: SELECT * FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, yield FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT AVG(yield) AS average_yield, MAX(yield) AS max_yield FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData;
SELECT * FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE crop_name = 'Carrots' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, harvest_date FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(yield) AS average_yield, MAX(yield) AS max_yield FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND planting_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY planting_date;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, harvest_date, location FROM UrbanFarmingPlotData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY location, harvest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM urban_farming_plots;
SELECT plot_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE yield_data > 0;
SELECT * FROM urban_farming_plots ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT plot_name, crop_type, planting_date, yield_data FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE crop_type = 'Tomato';
SELECT plot_id, plot_name, planting_date FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE crop_type = 'Tomato' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT plot_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE yield_data > 1000;

SELECT plot_id, crop_type, planting_date FROM urban_farming_plots JOIN crop_growth_timeline ON urban_farming_plots.plot_id = crop_growth_timeline.plot_id WHERE growth_stage = 'Harvest' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT plot_name, crop_type, planting_date, yield_data FROM urban_farming_plots WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT plot_name, crop_type, planting_date, growth_stage, growth_date, growth_notes FROM urban_farming_plots JOIN crop_growth_timeline ON urban_farming_plots.plot_id = crop_growth_timeline.plot_id WHERE crop_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY growth_date DESC, planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_data;
SELECT crop_type, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_growth_data WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering';
SELECT plot_id, location_name, city FROM plot_location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT plot_id, yield_date FROM yield_data WHERE yield_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_data;
SELECT crop_type, planting_date, growth_stage FROM crop_growth_data WHERE harvesting_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT plot_id, location_name, city FROM plot_location WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT yield_id, yield_amount, yield_date FROM yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT plot_id, location_name, address, city, postal_code FROM plot_location JOIN yield_data ON plot_location.plot_id = yield_data.plot_id;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE plot_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT plot_name, location FROM plots;
SELECT growth_date, growth_stage, growth_notes FROM crop_growth WHERE crop_id = 3 ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, plot_id, planting_date FROM crops WHERE plot_id = 4 ORDER BY planting_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT crop_name, growth_stage, growth_notes FROM crops JOIN crop_growth ON crops.crop_id = crop_growth.crop_id WHERE growth_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY growth_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plot_name, location, area_m2 FROM plots WHERE area_m2 > 500 ORDER BY area_m2 DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, yield_notes FROM crops JOIN yield_data ON crops.crop_id = yield_data.crop_id WHERE yield_date > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Plot;
SELECT plot_name, location_id FROM Plot ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT plot_id, crop_id, plot_name FROM Plot WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT city, state FROM Location WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM YieldData WHERE quality_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM Plot
SELECT plot_id, plot_name, crop_id FROM Plot WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT p.plot_name, l.city, c.crop_name FROM Plot p JOIN Location l ON p.location_id = l.location_id JOIN Crop c ON p.crop_id = c.crop_id
SELECT * FROM GrowthData WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' ORDER BY growth_date DESC
SELECT y.yield_amount, y.quality_rating, g.growth_stage FROM YieldData y JOIN GrowthData g ON y.data_id = g.data_id WHERE y.quality_rating = 'high' ORDER BY g.growth_date ASC
